name: Acid - Red - Liquid
additionalNotes: Acid cigars, a unique brand introduced in 1999, offer a wonderful, herbal, aromatic flavor. The Acid Blondie Red brings a whole new experience for Acid fans.Acid cigars use premium tobaccos, botanicals, herbs and essential oils in their secret floral formula to give smokers their best smoking experience. The blondie, known for the unique herbal and exotic flavors, gets a twist with a Cameroon Wrapper, and whole new flavor profile.
